verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came מִיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> time רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> And it came to pass a long אַ֠חֲרֵי <WH310> after אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after הֵנִ֨יחַ <WH5117> had given rest יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> that the LORD לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> unto Israel מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <WH341> from all their enemies מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> that Joshua זָקֵ֔ן <WH2205> aged בָּ֖א <WH935> [and] stricken בַּיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> in age

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> called יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> And Joshua לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> for all Israel לִזְקֵנָיו֙ <WH2205> [and] for their elders וּלְרָאשָׁ֔יו <WH7218> and for their heads וּלְשֹׁפְטָ֖יו <WH8199> and for their judges וּלְשֹֽׁטְרָ֑יו <WH7860> and for their officers וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am זָקַ֔נְתִּי <WH2204> unto them I am old בָּ֖אתִי <WH935> [and] stricken בַּיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> in age

וְאַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> and you רְאִיתֶ֗ם <WH7200> And ye have seen אֵת֩ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after עָשָׂ֜ה <WH6213> hath done יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֛ם <WH430> your God לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> unto all these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> because כִּ֚י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of you for the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God ה֖וּא <WH1931> who הַנִּלְחָ֥ם <WH3898> [is] he that hath fought לָכֶֽם׃

רְאוּ֩ <WH7200> Behold הִפַּ֨לְתִּי <WH5307> I have divided לָכֶ֜ם אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַ֠גּוֹיִם <WH1471> unto you by lot these nations הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֥ים <WH7604> that remain הָאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these בְּנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> to be an inheritance לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7626> for your tribes מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> from Jordan וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> with all the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִכְרַ֔תִּי <WH3772> that I have cut off וְהַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> even unto the great מְב֥וֹא <WH3996> the setting הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> of the sun

וַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <WH430> your God ה֚וּא <WH1931> He יֶהְדֳּפֵ֣ם <WH1920> he shall expel מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> them from before וְהוֹרִ֥ישׁ <WH3423> you and drive אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מִלִּפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> them from out of your sight וִֽירִשְׁתֶּם֙ <WH3423> and ye shall possess אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָ֔ם <WH776> their land כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֛ר <WH1696> hath promised יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God לָכֶֽם׃

וַחֲזַקְתֶּ֣ם <WH2388> courageous מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> Be ye therefore very לִשְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> to keep וְלַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> and to do אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכָּת֔וּב <WH3789> all that is written בְּסֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> in the book תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> of the law מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> of Moses לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> you may not סוּר־ <WH5493> that ye turn מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at יָמִ֥ין <WH3225> not aside therefrom [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <WH8040> or [to] the left

לְבִלְתִּי־ <WH1115> so בוֹא֙ <WH935> That ye come בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> not among these nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֥ים <WH7604> these that remain הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> among וּבְשֵׁ֨ם <WH8034> of the name אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֤ם <WH430> of their gods לֹא־ <WH3808> or תַזְכִּ֙ירוּ֙ <WH2142> among you neither make mention וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or תַשְׁבִּ֔יעוּ <WH7650> nor cause to swear וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַעַבְד֔וּם <WH5647> [by them] neither serve וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or תִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <WH7812> them nor bow לָהֶֽם׃

כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo בַּיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God תִּדְבָּ֑קוּ <WH1692> But cleave כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you עֲשִׂיתֶ֔ם <WH6213> as ye have done עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וַיּ֤וֹרֶשׁ <WH3423> hath driven out יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For the LORD מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> from before גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> nations גְּדֹלִ֣ים <WH1419> you great וַעֲצוּמִ֑ים <WH6099> and strong וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> you לֹא־ <WH3808> no עָ֤מַד <WH5975> hath been able to stand אִישׁ֙ <WH376> but [as for] you no man בִּפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> before עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> you unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

אִישׁ־ <WH376> man אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> One מִכֶּ֖ם <WH4480> at יִרְדָּף־ <WH7291> of you shall chase אָ֑לֶף <WH505> a thousand כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֗ם <WH430> your God ה֚וּא <WH1931> who הַנִּלְחָ֣ם <WH3898> he [it is] that fighteth לָכֶ֔ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> for you as he hath promised לָכֶֽם׃

וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH8104> heed מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> Take good לְנַפְשֹֽׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5315> therefore unto yourselves לְאַהֲבָ֖ה <WH157> that ye love אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> if שׁ֣וֹב <WH7725> Else if ye do in any wise תָּשׁ֗וּבוּ <WH7725> go back וּדְבַקְתֶּם֙ <WH1692> and cleave בְּיֶ֙תֶר֙ <WH3499> unto the remnant הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> of these nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> of these הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֥ים <WH7604> [even] these that remain הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> among וְהִֽתְחַתַּנְתֶּ֥ם <WH2859> among you and shall make marriages בָּהֶ֛ם וּבָאתֶ֥ם <WH935> with them and go in בָּהֶ֖ם וְהֵ֥ם <WH1992> like בָּכֶֽם׃

יָד֙וֹעַ֙ <WH3045> Know תֵּֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> for a certainty כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לֹ֨א <WH3808> will not יוֹסִ֜יף <WH3254> will no more יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֗ם <WH430> your God לְהוֹרִ֛ישׁ <WH3423> drive out אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> [any of] these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מִלִּפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> from before וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> become לָכֶ֜ם לְפַ֣ח <WH6341> you but they shall be snares וּלְמוֹקֵ֗שׁ <WH4170> and traps וּלְשֹׁטֵ֤ט <WH7850> unto you and scourges בְּצִדֵּיכֶם֙ <WH6654> in your sides וְלִצְנִנִ֣ים <WH6796> and thorns בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5869> in your eyes עַד־ <WH5704> until אֲבָדְכֶ֗ם <WH6> until ye perish מֵ֠עַל <WH5921> off הָאֲדָמָ֤ה <WH127> land הַטּוֹבָה֙ <WH2896> from off this good הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> hath given לָכֶ֔ם יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> now behold אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I הוֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> I [am] going הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> And behold this day בְּדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of all the earth וִידַעְתֶּ֞ם <WH3045> and ye know בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבַבְכֶ֣ם <WH3824> in all your hearts וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשְׁכֶ֗ם <WH5315> and in all your souls כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נָפַל֩ <WH5307> hath failed דָּבָ֨ר <WH1697> thing אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> that not one מִכֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> of all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> things הַטּוֹבִ֗ים <WH2896> of all the good אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֜ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> your God עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> concerning הַכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> concerning you all are come to pass לָכֶ֔ם לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נָפַ֥ל <WH5307> hath failed מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> thing אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> unto you [and] not one

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall come כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּ֤א <WH935> are come עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> off כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> things הַטּ֔וֹב <WH2896> Therefore it shall come to pass [that] as all good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֛ר <WH1696> promised יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> upon you which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> you כֵּן֩ <WH3651> so יָבִ֨יא <WH935> bring יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> you so shall the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5921> off אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> things הָרָ֔ע <WH7451> upon you all evil עַד־ <WH5704> until הַשְׁמִיד֣וֹ <WH8045> until he have destroyed אוֹתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> מֵ֠עַל <WH5921> off הָאֲדָמָ֤ה <WH127> land הַטּוֹבָה֙ <WH2896> you from off this good הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> hath given לָכֶ֔ם יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

בְּ֠עָבְרְכֶם <WH5674> When ye have transgressed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִ֨ית <WH1285> the covenant יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶם֮ <WH430> your God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> which he commanded אֶתְכֶם֒ <WH853> וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֗ם <WH1980> you and have gone וַעֲבַדְתֶּם֙ <WH5647> and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <WH7812> and bowed לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like וְחָרָ֤ה <WH2734> be kindled אַף־ <WH639> yourselves to them then shall the anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בָּכֶ֔ם וַאֲבַדְתֶּ֣ם <WH6> against you and ye shall perish מְהֵרָ֔ה <WH4120> quickly מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> off הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> land הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> from off the good אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> which he hath given לָכֶֽם׃ פ
